0-40小时 卧槽屠夫来了，快跑啊
40-80小时 卧槽屠夫来了，赶紧蹲蘑菇
80-120小时 卧槽屠夫来了，看我人皇走位皮一下

Très bon jeux, dlc sortant souvant, beaucoup de mise a jour ou on voit que les dévellopeur s'occupe du jeux pas comme certain d'autres.

Les campeurs sont le problèmes principaux, mais contre sa on n'a une ou deux compétences mais ne serait-il pas mieux de faire quelque chose contre les campeurs pas exemple quand un survivant ne bouge pas pendant une minute on a un corbeau qui vient sur la tête mais pour les tueurs qui campe la on n'a rien.

Bref revenons a nos claudettes heu nos corbeaux je veux dire, dbd c'est un très bon jeux  je le recommande fortement pour son bas prix et le gameplay.

played this game for quite a while now, had it for even longer. Started out as an amazing game, loved everything about it. Recently though i absolutly detest it. As a survivor it is impossible to play the game without the killer being OP. Any killer has the ability to know exactly where you are all the time. ITS A LOAD OF BS and i wish i could get my money back for the game. -1000000 out of 10

Kahvenizi çikolatanızı alın, şu oyunu oynayın. Bi bakmışsınız 500 saat falan oynamışsınız. Oyun içinde chat yok, küfür yok, son derece keyif alarak ister tek ister arkadaşlarınızla oynayabileceğiniz bir oyun. 

DLC almasanız da olur ama kesinlikle Freddy ve Doktor paketini tavsiye ederim. Oynanış olarak diğer katillere oranla bence daha eğlenceliler. 

Eğer benim gibi sürekli aynı oyunlardan sıkıldıysanız ve fresh bir tat arıyorsanız Dead by Daylight sanırım o açlığınzı fazlasıyla doyuracaktır. İyi oyunlar.

10/10

Where do I start? Well for one thing the "Killers" are not Over powered and that's a good thing. The survivors has different perks and abilities that you can combine to make an escape easier. This game is freedom of choice in which I love. Do you help some one off the hooks? Or let them suffer so that you can try and get the generators working? Be a hero or be selfish? By time of writing this I have 1.8 hours played. I have over 30 hours on Xbox one. PC is the best choice to play this of course. The controls are very easy to master.
Vale assolutamente i suo 10/20€, consigliatissimo
ОХУИТЕЛЬННАЯ ИГРА

MEGA NICE MACHT SPAß

マルチ対人ゲームの常として、プレイヤーのマナーの問題もあって正直言うと誰にでもオススメ出来るといえないのが個人的な感想です。
多少の煽り煽られは存在しますし、システムの仕様を利用した一方的なゲーム展開など日常茶飯事です。

ですがたまたまマッチしたプレイヤー同士が協力し合い逆境を覆しての脱出した時の達成感、全滅かと思えば対戦相手が見逃してくれたりとお互いの思いやる気持ちから生まれる楽しいと言えるマッチも少なからず存在します。
始めて間もない時はうまくいかなくて面白くないかもしれませんが、腐らずプレイしていれば確かに感じる上達感も楽しみの一つだと思います。

Very simple but very Enjoyable. Some killers are broken and need to be nerfed, some need to be buffed. Kinda obvious who they are.. There are some bugs but no game is perfect. For survivor I love to play Claudette, and the killers The Huntress & the Hag. I wish there was more customization, the current seems bland. Its not fun when people camp. Good graphics but if the host/killer has weird connection, its like they teleport. I still recommend it, as it is really fun with friends. A great way to get to know random strangers also....filled with terrifying misfortune. 

Smart choice devs, not having chat in-game is very helpful...as you know with other games the community can be a little.....aggressive. ;) Dev guys already thought ahead. Also could be used as a source of cheating...

Btw, the devs kinda put the dlc's a bit too pricey e.e. Only bought 2 dlcs because of winter sale and playing with few friends. (+Map)

--

UPDATE: Pretty much the same, except there is more customization and less bugs (Yay!) I don't know why I complained about the DLC's being too much 3 years ago, but it seems to be worthwhile. Don't have issues from what I can tell running it since I got a new computer since then.

мдаааа.. что же разработчики сделали с этой игрой((( сначала апнули докторо - стал нереально сильным маньяком (двадцатки не учитываются) стало практически нереально мансить в окнах, а палеты само сабой заканчиваются. А вот недавно апнули призрака ха-ха, ладно увеличение скорости и бусты после выхода из инвиза с этим можно играть, но возможность доставать сурва из шкафа в инвизе и аддон на ИММУНИТЕТ к ожогам, от которого я просто сгорел. РАЗРАБОТЧИКИ пожалуйста вспомните что в игре помимо маньяков есть сурвы, которые не менялись и которым не давали новых механик с момента выхода игры, каждый новый сурв в игре просто новая моделька и текстура - проффита от него 0....

Love the game honestly. Its a short pvp setting that can leave a ton of jumpscares. Its pretty skill based too, with a touch of rng to makes things good. Only crap side of the game is the matchmaking is total shit. You can be super low tier faced off against top notch people in your first game -_- and it will happen a lot if you play the killer. If you can get past that thought then everything else is pretty good.

이거는 1번 하기전 망설이게 된다 그러나 하게 되면 존나 꾸르잼이다그리고 아이템 모으는 것도 꿀잼이자 개속 블러드판 되는게 꿀잼인것같다그대신 살인마가 존나 불쌍하다 왠지 모르게 존나 불쌍하다판자 박살내면 손전등으로 조지고 드디어 잡아서 좋아하는데 유리로 팔 박아버려서 탈출 하고  살인자 입장으로는 존나 개같다 내가 해서 그런게 아니다 나는 듀오 햇는데 애들이 존나잘한다 여기는 진짜로 고인물이다 그러나 한번해보면 언젠간 석유 될것같은 냄새가 난다
